name: Silvrichcon - Prologue to "Eddie's Entertainment Co."
description:
Hello, Silvrichcon OS!

The game has a console which can run simple commands. You can run games and interact with the rest of it from there. This isn't rally a fantasy console, it's a horror game.. ..You'll just have to play I guess.

This is a prologue to a bigger game... A 3D one! 

Inspired by Venge (by Ekrcoaster), Eddie's Entertainment Co. Will be a fully featured horror game with jumpscares, stealth, and punishment for doing things wrong.

This will be bought to life with blender and with the free blender course I will be getting from this submission to the Gamedev.tv jam. If you're interested in the story (you can find it at the end of the game), follow my itch.io account for updates and devlogs (I might start youtube , even 👀)

Also, let me know if you want fullscreen, I'll need to reupload files though.
